result.ga: An bhfuil sibh ceart go leor
result.orig: An bhfuil sibh ceart go leor
result.html: An bhfuil sibh ceart go leorAre you okay?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil siḃ ceart go leorAre you okay?

result.eng: Can I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.
result.ga: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leat
result.orig: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leat

result.ponchtml: An féidir liom laḃairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leatCan I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.

result.eng: Would you like a drink? - Okay.
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat deoch - Ceart go leor
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat deoch - Ceart go leor

result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat deoċ - Ceart go leorWould you like a drink? - Okay.

result.ga: Tá gach rud anseo ceart go leor

result.html: Tá gach rud anseo ceart go leorEverything here is okay.
